title: i finished my missions and didn't get any blue essence
body: as the title says, i finished the rune collector mission, and didn't get my promised 26000BE

replies.body: Hey there, you'll need to go to your hextech loot inventory and claim capsules once the mission is completed.
I was supposed to get 70,000 and didn't get mine either. The game said it gave it to me but my balance remains the same.
